title: Unity Game Developer NEW!
full_description: Responsibilities BlueHalo is seeking a mid-level Unity Game Developer in Huntsville, AL. This position supports existing video game projects on Redstone Arsenal for U.S. Army outreach and recruiting. The candidate is expected to know the ins and outs of the Unity engine and C# object-oriented development. Experience with mobile development on Android or iOS both in Unity and with native apps will be highly regarded. The Company was founded in 1989 and has served its core customer base as a trusted partner for decades focused on solving the Defense and National Security Community's hardest challenges. AEgis is an end to end life cycle partner through R&D, development, and into operations.
